tool_description: Create Payment Links and Subscription payment requests.
name: PayRequest
title: PayRequest

api_list.name: POST /customers
api_list.description: In our API you won't need to add a seperate  customer. We will do that for you! However if you want to get all your customers you can use the next call.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://payrequest.p.rapidapi.com/customers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "payrequest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://payrequest.p.rapidapi.com/customers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "payrequest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
